Db.UserConnectionString: <Azure Storage connection string to keep user info>
Db.ConnectionString: <Azure Storage connection string to keep settings data>
Db.SecretsConnString: <Optional. Azure Storage connection string to keep secrets>

LockTimeInMinutes: <How much time admin can lock key for edit some value in KeyValues>
SlackNotificationsConnString: Optional. <Azure account used for Lykke.Service.SlackNotification service>

GitSettings.GitHubToken: <Optional. Personal access token with full control for private repositories - for private repositories on enterprise github>
GitSettings.BitbucketEmail: <Optional. User with read access to Bitbacket private repository to upload settings.yaml files>
